title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: My sister has a learning disability and her husband squandered $100,000. How do I protect her from his financial misdeeds?
items.description: “She always worked part-time in a grocery store or at stock-clerk jobs until COVID. He does Instacart and similar deliveries for work.”

items.title: Warren Buffett gave this timely investment advice at Berkshire’s annual meeting
items.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO had some choice words for investors before announcing he was stepping down after six decades.

items.title: My friend’s partner is pregnant, but she’s married to another man. Is he financially responsible?
items.description: “She claimed her husband was cheating on her and stopped paying their mortgage.”

items.title: ‘We are the most privileged’: My husband and I are tired of paying for our friends. How do we get them to pay their way?
items.description: “My husband almost always ends up paying for everyone or picks up the entire bill.”
